reviews.review_msg: he's big. very nice person, but simple things make him pissed off in class. very smart.
Engaging lectures, with relevance to the real world.
Very excited at all time!! he is a very good instructor, never beats around the bush, always at the point. attend the lectures because his notes are awsome but he doesnt post them online.

i had her as a TA in MATH 380. one of the worse ta. confused. stunned. she has the knowledge but does not communicate it to the students. going through the assignment question is a torture since she could not write properly and mistake was made as she went through the problem. she didn't come prepare enough.

Still remains one of my favourite profs. Very considerate for individuals, lenient, fair exams and knowledgeable. Always available for extra help and encourages individual thinking outside of the box. Clear, energetic and entertaining lectures that i never fell asleep in, writing might not be the best.

Personally I think Tom is a great prof. He is really responsive to questions and his lectures are really interesting if you enjoy the history of math. The assignments were a little tedious but they are few and far between. However, he does take a while to mark, or post anything. Other than that i really enjoyed the course.
Very clear lecturer. Seemed very interested in the material. Gave extremely helpful suggestions with the paper.
He is too busy to post even syllabus in webct. he never post any materials(eg. assignment solution) on time. he is the one of the most idle profs in my life.
Excellent prof, very kind and responsive to students. Also has great knowlegde and able to communicate material very well.
